dataSample.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `PREFIX_leowidgets` ( `id_leowidgets` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `params` mediumtext, `id_shop` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `key_widget` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_leowidgets`,`id_shop`) ) ENGINE=ENGINE_TYPE AUTO_INCREMENT=66 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `PREFIX_leohook` ( `id_hook` int(11) NOT NULL, `id_module` int(11) NOT NULL, `id_shop` int(11) NOT NULL, `theme` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `name_hook` varchar(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_hook`,`id_module`,`id_shop`) ) ENGINE=ENGINE_TYPE DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
